main event: Radar detected an object with considerable brilliance that appeared to be stationary, then moved rapidly at an estimated speed of 2,000 mph.
interesting points: The object was observed for 2 minutes.
The object had a considerable brilliance and appeared to be stationary before moving rapidly.
The object reached very high speeds, estimated at 2,000 mph.
No sound was heard from the object.
The object was sighted at an elevation of approximately 30 degrees.
